name: subgrcl

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cgrp))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1), c1 ∈ Grp, c0 ⊆(Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]c0)∈ Grp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cgrp)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)↔(c1 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ Grp))

-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
